about.title: Welcome to Our Children's Party Hall!
about.intro: Our spacious 184 m² party hall is designed especially for children under the age of twelve. It offers a fun, safe, and inclusive environment with the following features:

playroom.title: Playroom
playroom.description: Equipped with a trampoline, climbing wall, jungle house, ball pit, and a variety of soft toys, including sensory toys for children with special needs.

joycraft.title: JoyCraft Corner
joycraft.description: A supervised creative space where children can enjoy hands-on activities like planting seeds or decorating cupcakes.

vr.title: VR Room
vr.description: A room with screens for virtual reality games and digital fun.

dining.title: Dining Area
dining.description: A cozy place for hosting birthday parties, family gatherings, and group celebrations.

important_notes.arrival: Please arrive 15 minutes early to set up before your party begins.
important_notes.privacy: We host one party at a time, so your group will enjoy full privacy during the event.
important_notes.private_visits: When the hall is not booked for parties, we welcome private visits. Parents can bring their children and friends to play in a safe and engaging environment. For private visits, please contact us in advance to schedule your session.

safe.title: Safe Environment
safe.description: State-of-the-art safety features and trained supervision

themed.title: Themed Rooms
themed.description: Customizable party spaces for any theme

packages.description: Everything you need for the perfect party

gallery.title: Our Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Take a peek at the fun that awaits

services.title: Other Services
services.subtitle: We work with the best partners to make your event unforgettable

catering.title: Catering – Ranniku Peod
catering.description: Professional catering services for all your party needs
catering.info: Ranniku Peod offers a variety of delicious meal options for your party. You can choose your favorite dishes, which will be delivered in disposable containers—making cleanup easy and letting you enjoy the event stress-free. If you prefer, you can also pick up the meals yourself.
catering.imageAlt: Elegant party platters with colorful food arrangements

superheroes.title: Superhero Appearances
superheroes.description: Make your child's dream come true with their favorite superhero
superheroes.info: Bring extra magic to your party with visits from Superman, Batman, or Spider-Man! These superheroes will interact with the kids, play games, and create unforgettable moments.
superheroes.imageAlt: Superhero performer interacting with excited children at a party

glitterTattoos.title: Glitter Tattoos
glitterTattoos.description: Sparkly temporary tattoos that kids love
glitterTattoos.info: Children love glitter tattoos! A professional artist will decorate little arms and faces with fun, sparkly designs that are safe for the skin and easy to remove.
glitterTattoos.imageAlt: Child showing off a sparkly glitter tattoo design

balloonMaster.title: Balloon Master
balloonMaster.info: Watch amazing balloon animals and shapes come to life! The Balloon Master will entertain the children with creative balloon art and fun interactions.
balloonMaster.imageAlt: Colorful balloon sculptures and arrangements at a children's party

facePainters.title: Face Painters
facePainters.description: Transform faces into works of art
facePainters.info: Professional face painters will turn your little guests into tigers, butterflies, pirates, and more. High-quality paints are used, safe for sensitive skin.
facePainters.imageAlt: Child with a beautifully painted face design

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services

items.reservation: The €50 booking fee can be paid in euros via a secure bank link. Payments are processed by PayCly, which receives only the personal information required to complete the payment.
items.payment: The booking fee is non-refundable, but it will be deducted from the final amount. A confirmation email will be sent once payment is received.
items.cancellation: Cancellations are not allowed, as the reservation includes specific equipment and scheduled time that are difficult to rebook on short notice.
items.modifications: If you need to reschedule, please let us know as early as possible. The booking can be changed once.

items.applicability: These house rules apply to everyone present on the premises of JoySpot.
items.duration: The hall (184 m²) is available for 2.5 hours. You may arrive 15 minutes early to prepare.
items.cleaning: After your party, the hall should be returned to its original condition: toys tidied, dishes cleaned, and garbage disposed of.
items.cleaningFee: If the room is not cleaned, we may issue a cleaning invoice (€50).
items.overtime: Please vacate the premises on time. Extra time may be charged.

items.equipment: The kitchen includes: espresso machine, kettle, microwave, refrigerator, serving bowls, trays, pitchers, 10 mugs, serving cutlery, cake utensils, and flower vases.
items.provided: We provide: coffee beans, tea, sugar, and water dispenser access.
items.tableware: Please bring your own disposable tableware.
items.restrictions: Use kitchen items only in the dining area — not in the playroom.
items.candles: Cake candles are allowed, but no cake fountains, fireworks, or other pyrotechnics.

items.care: Please treat all toys and furnishings with care. Return everything to its place after the party.
items.damage: If any item is damaged, inform us so we can agree on a solution.
items.equipment: Only adults may handle audio, lighting, and technical equipment.

items.supervision: The adult who booked the hall must remain present throughout the event and is responsible for children's safety and proper use of the facilities.
items.youngChildren: Children under 3 years old must be accompanied by an adult at all times due to small parts in the play area.
items.climbing: Climbing on windows, railings, or roofs is not allowed. All play structures must be used appropriately.
items.gum: No chewing gum is allowed in the hall.

items.smoking: Smoking and alcohol are not allowed inside the hall.
items.liability: JoySpot is not responsible for lost clothing or personal items.
items.foodDrinks: Please do not bring food or drinks into the playroom or VR room. These are only allowed in the dining area.

items.arrangement: Additional services should be pre-arranged via email or phone.
items.cleaning: If you would like to use our cleaning service, please inform us when booking.
items.cleaningIncludes: The service includes: putting toys back in place, washing local dishes, and cleaning dining tables.
items.hostResponsibility: The party host is responsible for removing all items brought in, such as food and disposable tableware.
items.external: If you book external catering or entertainers, kindly let us know in advance.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: JoySpot OÜ values your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our online booking system. By making a booking, you confirm that you have read and understood the terms of this policy.

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content: JoySpot OÜ is the controller of your personal data. For the purpose of processing payments, we share the necessary information with our payment service provider, PayCly.

dataCollection.title: What Personal Data We Collect
dataCollection.intro: When booking the JoySpot party hall through our online booking system, we collect the following personal data directly from you:

items.parentName: Name of the parent or guardian

dataCollection.necessity: Providing this data is necessary for us to process your booking and deliver our services. Without this information, we may be unable to confirm your reservation or provide access to the hall.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.intro: We process your personal data to:

items.communication: Communicate with you about your reservation
items.contract: Fulfill our obligations under the contract we form upon your booking

legalBasis.conclusion: This processing is necessary for the performance of a contract between you and JoySpot OÜ.

security.title: Data Access and Security
security.access: Your personal data is only accessed by authorized JoySpot personnel who are responsible for managing bookings and delivering services. If required by law, we may also share your data with public authorities.
security.transfer: We do not transfer your data outside of Estonia.
security.measures: JoySpot uses appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. If third-party service providers are involved, we ensure that they meet similar data protection standards.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to provide our services or as required by applicable law.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

items.access: The right to access the personal data we hold about you
items.correction: The right to correct inaccurate or incomplete data
items.deletion: The right to request deletion of your data
items.restriction: The right to restrict or object to the processing of your data (within legal limits)

rights.contact: To exercise these rights or if you have any questions, please contact us at
